name: 許書涵
objective:
先修課程：物理或負責教授同意。不可壓縮流體、質量不滅、非黏性流體之運動、柏努力定律、線性及角動量定理及其應用、渦流與勢流、黏性流、納維爾－史脫克斯方程式及應用、管中壓力頭損失及增加、邊界層與分離升力與阻力及雷諾方程式之應用。
Incompressible fluid, mass conservation, invoiced flow, Bernoulli principle, linear, angular momentum conservation and application, vortex, and potential flow, Navier-Stoke equation, pressure loss, boundary layer flow, separation flow, lift and drag, Reynold analogy and applications.
schedule:
Week 1: Introduction
Week 2: Fundamental Concepts
Week 3: Fundamental Concepts
Week 4: Fluid Statics
Week 5: Fluid Statics
Week 6: Basic equations in Integral Form for a Control Volume
Week 7: Basic equations in Integral Form for a Control Volume
Week 8: Introduction to Differential analysis of Fluid Motion
Week 9: Midterm Exam
Week 10: Introduction to Differential analysis of Fluid Motion
Week 11: Incompressible Inviscid Flow
Week 12: Incompressible Inviscid Flow
Week 13: Internal Incompressible Viscous Flow
Week 14: Internal Incompressible Viscous Flow
Week 15: Internal Incompressible Viscous Flow
Week 16: External Incompressible Viscous Flow
Week 17: External Incompressible Viscous Flow
Week 18: Final Exam
materials: Fluid mechanics. 4th ed in SI units., 2019, Yunus, A. Cengel., and John M. Cimbala., McGraw Hill.
